data.name: Preventive Strike Demo
data.detailed_description:
A very short demo of Preventive strike.
--------------------------------------------

Preventive Strike is a dynamic arcade scroll-shooter set in a fictional environment, where you get to control an overpowered attack helicopter. Your objective is to drive the enemy out of your land and make your way to the enemy base and destroy it. They don't know what's coming, but neither do you!

The game has an isometric view on the level, which stands out from the typical for this genre top-down or side view and adds some depth to the environment. The graphics are simple yet eye-catching, with lots of stuff happening on screen. There's no room for boredom.

Key features include most of what you'd expect to see in an arcade shooter: a variety of enemies, power-ups, changing environments, player progression, score, etc.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6550 2.33Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 8800GT 512 MB or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek HD Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: AMD FX-6300/Intel equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 270/Nvidia equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
